brand_identity.name: Baeju0 Labs
brand_identity.core_philosophy: Small experiments, solid products, transparent records.

typography.font_loading_strategy: Preload Display and Utility fonts. Use swap for Body text to ensure instant visibility.

color_usage_rules.accent: Primary Call-to-Actions (CTAs) and critical validation points only.
color_usage_rules.background: Deep black (#09090B) for industrial dark aesthetic.
color_usage_rules.cards: Elevated surface (#18181B) for cards and interactive elements.
color_usage_rules.borders: Subtle borders (#27272A) for structure, stronger (#3F3F46) for section dividers.

spacing_and_layout.layout_philosophy: Modular Grid. Every element lives in a defined rectangular cell. Visible grid lines act as a framework, symbolizing the 'engineering' aspect.

layout_strategy.description: Information is organized in blocks (bento-box style but rigid/technical).
layout_strategy.grid_breaking: Only the main Hero CTA breaks the grid to create visual tension.

spatial_composition.negative_space: Dense but organized. Mimics a dashboard or a well-packed workbench.
spatial_composition.z_index_strategy: Flat mostly. Modals/Popovers float with sharp shadows at z-index 100.

primary_cta.style: Solid block, sharp corners, mono typography.
primary_cta.hover: Slight vertical lift (-2px) + subtle light brutalist shadow.

secondary.hover: Fill with primary color, invert text.

buttons.states: Active state mimics physical button press (scale 0.98).

forms.input: Rectangular, bottom-border focused or full-box technical inputs. No rounded corners.

navigation.style: Minimal sticky bar. Logo left, simplified menu right. Blur backdrop with dark transparency.

shadows.heavy: 4px 4px 0px rgba(255,255,255,0.15) (Inverted brutalist shadow for dark mode)

motion_and_animation.animation_philosophy: Mechanical Precision. Movements are linear or swift cubic-bezier. No soft, dreamy fades.

page_load_animations.stagger: Grid items appear sequentially like a system boot sequence.

scroll_effects.sticky: Section headers stick to the top to mimic a filing cabinet.
scroll_effects.reveal: Cards slide up with a hard stop.

hover_states.cards: Border color change to Accent. Immediate response.

background_strategy.main: Graph paper pattern (very subtle #151518 grid on #09090B).

visual_effects.noise: Subtle film grain (4% opacity) over the whole page to add texture.

decorative_elements.timestamps: Dynamic current time display in the header (Lab feel).

focal_points: Now Shipping Cards with Status Badges
visual_hierarchy.visual_weight_distribution: Top-heavy hero (3x height), followed by high-contrast cards. Text sections are lighter.
visual_hierarchy.reading_flow: F-pattern strictly followed. Clear headings guide the scan.

responsive_strategy.mobile_strategy: Stack grid cells vertically. Keep 'Live' status badges prominent. CTA buttons span full width.
responsive_strategy.touch_targets: Minimum 48px height for all interactive elements.
responsive_strategy.thumb_zone_optimization: Primary navigation and main CTAs kept in the lower 60% of the screen on mobile.

accessibility.color_contrast: AAA standard for text (Light text on dark background).
accessibility.focus_states: Accent color outline (2px) for keyboard focus.

psychological_triggers.transparency: Showing 'Concept' and 'Retired' builds trust through honesty.

cta_optimization.placement: Sticky bottom bar on mobile for '지금 만드는 제품 보기'.
cta_optimization.copy: Use action verbs: 'View Product', '지금 만드는 제품 보기'.

trust_signals.updates: Last updated date visible on project cards.

korean_market_specific.kakao_share: Custom OG image for KakaoTalk sharing generated from the 'Identity' section.

ab_testing_candidates: Hero Copy (Identity focus vs Product focus)
